name: Michael Vega
description: A Result-Oriented Web Developer building and managing Websites and Web Applications that leads to the success of the overall product.
about: Hi, I'm Michael, I consider myself a results-oriented professional, dynamic, highly organized, innovative, fast learner and capable of performing multiple tasks. Oriented to improve every day to help companies/people achieve their vision and mission, and at the same time, achieve my personal goals. Committed to delivering high-quality results.

I enjoy being the bridge between engineering and design, and feel right at home as a front end engineer. I'm experienced in developing and designing webs, from simple landing pages to full-fledged web apps.
I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.

projects.name: Click Counter
projects.description: This is a simple click counter built with React.js, you can increase, decrease or reset the click count and if you want there is also a dark/light switch to change the theme color of the page.

projects.name: Palindrome Checker
projects.description: App built with VanillaJS, that checks if is palindrome or not. Palindrome is a word or sentence that's spelled the same way both forward and backward, ignoring punctuation, case, and spacing.

projects.name: Pokédex
projects.description: This is a pokédex built with ReactJS, you can find more than 1k Pokémon. There is a pagination area where you can navigate between pages to see more Pokémon. You can also find a search engine that searches by Pokémon name.

projects.name: Lion Cars
projects.description: This is a small catalog of some of my favorite cars, built with NextJS and TailwindCSS. You will see an information card about each car and also a page with more information and a gallery with some cool pics.
